alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:23PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southeastern Baker, northwestern Putnam and Clay Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Maxville to near Starke to near Hawthorne. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Middleburg, Oakleaf Plantation, Florahome, Melrose Landing, Doctors Inlet and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
